column2: "...hmph. About time. I knew you'd be passing through here."
"You still owe me the rest of our conversation from before."
"Hmm, where should we begin... maybe about ARKS mission? Or life on the ship?"
"Teehee, and that's not even scratching the surface! I hope you're ready!"
"...Huh. Between the patrols and the defense operations, ARKS sure has its work cut out for it."
"I may be an ARKS member, but my role is different from the rest."
"What is it, you ask? To destroy the darkers, and protect everyone."
"That's my sole purpose."
"It's what this kid says. We must exterminate the darkers to correct our entire history."
"This obelisk is what remains after the previous Claris Claes struggled to seal Dark Falz 30 years ago."
"...seal, not defeat. It took everything just to seal Dark Falz away, he says."
"I'm sure she was crushed about it."
"...yeah. I'd be too, if I were in her shoes."
"But if it was just me, I would've taken Falz head on and mopped the floor with him, not some crappy seal!"
"Hey, relax! I'll be the one to take down Dark Falz and his army of darkers, no worries."
"1. Shall I help?"
"2. It's too dangerous alone."
"You? Help me? Hmph, I appreciate the thought, but I can handle it myself."
"I fight pretty recklessly, so you could get caught in the crossfire."
"Hey! How rude! You don't believe I can handle it, is that it?"
"It's fine. I'm fine alone. Always have been, always will be."
"In fact, it's probably better this way. I fight pretty recklessly, and you might get hit in the crossfire."
"It'd be for nothing if I took down Dark Falz, and all the ARKS with him, y'know?"
"...but, thank you. I know you said that out of concern for me."
"Ah! Oh, look at the time. I have to get going."
"See you later. We'll talk even more next time! Bye!"
